Text: They may have split briefly this weekend but Jeremy McConnell and Stephanie Davis are DEFINITELY getting married. The couple revealed they're moving quickly ahead with their Celebrity Big Brother romance and marriage, children and matching tattoos are all on the cards during their first joint interview on Loose Women. After shocking fans by breaking up this weekend, Jezza and Steph were grilled by Katie Price during their first joint interview on Loose Women and said they were completely committed to being together...for life. Asking Jeremy: "You're prepared to be with Steph for the rest of your life, yes or no," the coy star gave a "yes", causing the audience to break out into cheers. They also confirmed their plans to move in together and get married are still on. Katie Price grilled the lovebirds(Image: ITV) While the duo were photographed looking at rings together, Jezza insisted if he was proposing it would be with a better ring. The former Hollyoaks beauty revealed that they're so committed to each other, kids are already on the cards. "We'll take things step by step, definitely kids but not this week, next week," the brunette beauty claimed. Read more: Steph admitted she would like to be a mum(Image: ITV) The couple also revealed exactly what happened last weekend when they briefly split insisting it was all down to a "misunderstanding".   Explaining what happened Steph revealed she'd text her boyfriend saying she couldn't "do this anymore" on Saturday night. Jeremy then took this that she wanted to split up, but Steph insisted that WASN'T what she meant.  "It was all just getting on top of me," she admitted. "He took it as I'd ended it," she continued, "he was angry at me, it was a misunderstanding." Read more: They're definitely back on(Image: ITV) Denying their romance was a fake for the cameras, the duo insisted they were completely committed to each other and were in the relationship for the long haul.  Claiming his wild single days are behind him, Jeremy claimed the Hollyoaks actress was the only woman for him and that their love had only intensified since leaving the CBB house. Jez and Steph fell in love on Celebrity Big Brother(Image: instagram.com/stephaniedavis88) To confirm their love the CBB lovers revealed they'll be getting matching tattoos next week, with Jezza claiming it'll probably be an Oasis lyric.   Steph and Jeremy cancelled their Monday appearance on Loose Women following a brief split. The confusing pair, who fell for each other in the Celebrity Big Brother house, ended their romance at the weekend and unfollowed each other on Twitter (which should have meant it was official), only to get back together days later. Sigh. Jez released a 'statement' on Twitter, after fans questioned what was going on between them. It is no showmance He wrote: "Just letting people know me and steph are fine. We are very happy we both have mad schedules. It's my job to go on a personal appearance and get pics with girls . Steph comes and stays in hotel with me. We trust each other and love each other." Thanks for all the support :)." Mirror Celebs previously reported that the pair had suddenly deleted each other from the social media site, which made it obvious they had been rowing, and Jez then posted and deleted a tweet about being a mug and moving on. Hmmm. They briefly split last week(Image: Rex/Liverpool Echo) He wrote: "I have been the biggest mug . I'm sorry for the people who tried to warn me. But you live and learn . Onwards and upwards (sic)" Followers who had supposedly 'warned' him about Stephanie, who cheated on her boyfriend Sam Reece with Jez while in CBB , told him they had been telling him all along not to get with her. But it seems he quickly had a change of heart after calling it off.
